mapper.select: SELECT TASK_DATA_ID AS id,TEXT AS text,START_DATE AS start_date,DURATION AS duration,OPEN AS open,TASK_ID AS taskId,PROGRESS AS progress, PARENT AS parent,USER_PRIV AS userPriv FROM TASK_GANTT_DATA WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND TASK_ID=#{taskId}

SELECT D.TASK_DATA_ID AS taskDataId,D.TEXT AS text,D.DURATION AS duration, D.START_DATE AS startDate,D.PROGRESS AS progress FROM TASK_GANTT_DATA D WHERE D.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND D.USER_PRIV=#{accountId} AND D.TASK_ID IN(SELECT T.TASK_ID FROM TASK T WHERE T.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND T.STATUS='0')

SELECT D.TASK_DATA_ID AS taskDataId,D.TEXT AS text,T.TASK_NAME AS taskName,D.DURATION AS duration, D.START_DATE AS startDate,D.PROGRESS AS progress FROM TASK_GANTT_DATA D LEFT JOIN TASK T ON D.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND D.TASK_ID=T.TASK_ID WHERE D.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND D.USER_PRIV=#{accountId} AND T.STATUS='0' ORDER BY D.START_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,5
